    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ALLEGRO

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>

      </font></td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="7%">
              <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr bgcolor="#cceeff">
            <td align="left" colspan="3" valign="bottom" width="81%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font size="+0"><font size="+0"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">PART
      I</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">V</font></font></font></font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr bgcolor="white">
            <td valign="bottom" width="81%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="7%">
              <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr bgcolor="#cceeff">
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="81%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline">Item&#160;15. Exhibits, Financial Statement
      Schedules</font></font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="7%">
              <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      17</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr bgcolor="white">
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="81%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline">Signatures</font></font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>

              <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;

      </table>
    </div><br>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="1">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
      </div>
    </div><br>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; TEXT-DECORATION: underline"><a name="part_1_2_2">PART I</a></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><a name="item_1_3_2"><br></a></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Item
1.&#160; Description of Business</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Allegro
Biodiesel Corporation (&#8220;Allegro&#8221;, &#8220;we,&#8221; &#8220;us&#8221; or &#8220;Company&#8221;) is a publicly-traded
shell company which, from September 20, 2006 through September 9, 2008, owned a
biodiesel production facility that used renewable agricultural-based feedstock
(primarily soybean oil) to produce biodiesel fuel (the &#8220;Pollock
Facility&#8221;).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">During
2007, the biodiesel industry experienced a significant increase in the cost of
soybean oil. The increase in the cost of soybean oil had a significant negative
effect on our profit margins and cash flows. Given these economic conditions, on
October 15, 2007 we adopted a Company-wide cost reduction plan to reduce our
costs. We also significantly reduced, and then halted production at the Pollock
Facility during the fourth quarter of 2007.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Due to
the continuing difficult conditions in the biodiesel industry described above,
during the second quarter of 2008, the independent member of our board of
directors recommended to our stockholders to approve the sale (the &#8220;Sale&#8221;) of
100% of the membership interests of our wholly owned subsidiary, Vanguard
Synfuels, LLC (&#8220;Vanguard&#8221;), to Consolidated Energy Holdings, LLC, a Louisiana
limited liability company (&#8220;CEH&#8221;). Two of our former executive officers, Darrell
Dubroc and Tim Collins hold membership interests in CEH. As reported in our Form
8-K dated September 9, 2008, the Sale was completed on September 9,
2008.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Pursuant
to the Sale, CEH assumed substantially all of the liabilities of Vanguard,
including (i) approximately $2.9 million in senior secured debt with First South
Farm Credit, ACA (&#8220;First South&#8221;); (ii) approximately $589,000 in trade payables
and accrued liabilities; (iii) obligations of Allegro and/or Vanguard under
existing employment agreements with employees of Allegro and of Vanguard; and
(iv) $258,000 in accrued compensation for certain Allegro employees that
accumulated since our Company-wide expense reduction plan through the date of
the Sale.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">As a
consequence of the Sale, we have reduced our outstanding liabilities and
eliminated our secured debt, as described above. While we no longer have any
operating assets, and are considered a &#8220;shell company&#8221; under the rules and
regulations of the Securities and Exchange Commission, we will continue as a
publicly-traded corporation with non-operating assets, including cash and our
equity investment in Community Power Corporation (&#8220;CPC&#8221;).&#160;&#160;We recently
increased our cash balance due to our receipt of an arbitration award relating
to our 2006 acquisition of Vanguard.&#160;&#160;We were awarded (i)
approximately $875,000 in cash plus $64,328 of accrued interest, and (ii)
519,736 of our shares from the escrow account that was established in connection
with our acquisition of Vanguard.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Management
is actively seeking strategic alternatives, including the pursuit of additional
financing for acquisitions and evaluating potential strategic transactions,
either in renewable energy or other industries. However, due to the current
economic environment, we cannot assure our current and future stockholders that
there will be adequate funds available when needed and on acceptable terms, or
that a strategic alternative can be arranged.&#160;&#160;We are also attempting
to sell our minority interest in CPC.&#160;&#160;If we are unable to arrange for
a strategic alternative, obtain additional financing, or sell our minority
interest in CPC by the fourth quarter of 2009, we will not be able to continue
as a going concern and will likely be forced to liquidate and wind-up our
operations.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Our
History</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We were
incorporated in the State of Minnesota in 1990. From our inception in 1990
through January 2005, operating as Diametrics Medical, Inc., we were involved
with the development, production and distribution of medical devices. All such
operations were discontinued during 2005. From January 2005 to September 19,
2006, we were considered a &#8220;shell company&#8221; as defined by the Securities and
Exchange Commission and our business activities were primarily focused on
raising additional financing and the pursuit of a strategic
transaction.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">On
November 21, 2005, BCC Acquisition II, LLC (&#8220;BCCAII&#8221;) and certain of the holders
of our subordinated convertible debt, who collectively beneficially owned
securities representing approximately 64% of our fully diluted common stock,
entered into an agreement to sell their securities to Ocean Park Advisors, LLC,
a California-based advisory firm (&#8220;OPA&#8221;), and M.A.G. Capital, LLC (&#8220;MAG&#8221;) for a
nominal amount of cash. In connection with the closing of this transaction,
<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the </font>Board of
Directors and Chief Financial Officer at that time resigned and Bruce Comer and
Heng Chuk, principals of OPA, became members of the Board. Additionally,
Messrs.&#160;Comer and Chuk became the Chief Executive Officer and the Chief
Financial Officer&#160;&amp; Secretary of the Company, respectively. Mr. Chuk
resigned as an officer and director of Allegro in February 2008.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">On
December&#160;6, 2005, we concluded an exchange of certain securities (the
&#8220;Exchange Offering&#8221;). MAG, its affiliated funds, and other investors who held
our 2005 Subordinated Convertible Notes, the 200<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">5</font> Senior Secured
Convertible Notes, our Senior Secured Convertible Notes issued May&#160;2, 2005,
and our Series&#160;F and G Convertible Preferred Stock, exchanged their
securities for shares of newly created Series&#160;H Convertible Preferred Stock
(the &#8220;Series&#160;H&#8221;), and OPA exchanged its securities for shares of newly
created Series&#160;I Convertible Preferred Stock (the &#8220;Series&#160;I&#8221;).
Pursuant to this transaction, 10,000 and 15,000 shares of the Series&#160;F and
Series&#160;G Convertible Preferred Stock, respectively, were cancelled and
27,889 and 13,794 shares of the Series&#160;H and Series&#160;I, respectively,
were issued.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">On
December&#160;6, 2005, Monarch Pointe Fund, Ltd., a fund affiliated with MAG,
and Asset Managers International Limited, each entered into an agreement to loan
us up to $375,000 (for an aggregate of up to $750,000), in the form of
Convertible Secured Promissory Notes (the &#8220;Convertible Notes&#8221;), to use for
(i)&#160;the payment of certain expenses, including the payment of $75,000 to
OPA as compensation for its services in structuring the transactions mentioned
above, (ii)&#160;to settle with certain creditors, and (iii)&#160;to develop and
pursue strategic alternatives. On the same date, we made an initial draw of
$450,000 under the Convertible Secured Promissory Notes. The remaining $300,000
was drawn upon in January 2006.</font></div><br>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="1">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">On
June&#160;15, 2006, our Board of Directors approved a one for one hundred
reverse stock split of our common stock. The record date of the stock split was
June&#160;30, 2006.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">On
September&#160;20, 2006, we acquired Vanguard Synfuels, LLC (&#8220;Vanguard&#8221;), a
producer of biodiesel fuel that owns and operates a production facility located
in Pollock, Louisiana (the &#8220;Acquisition&#8221;). The aggregate purchase price for 100%
of the membership interests of Vanguard consisted of cash in the amount of
approximately $17.7 million and the issuance of 4,300 shares of our Series K
Convertible Preferred Stock (which was convertible into approximately
11.1&#160;million shares of our common stock). Of the purchase price, $1.8
million and 430 shares of the Series K Convertible Preferred Stock were placed
into escrow for our benefit against any breaches of or inaccuracies in the
Vanguard members' representations and warranties, with any remaining funds and
shares to be released from escrow 18 months from the closing of the Acquisition.
We also repaid $0.8 million in outstanding loans Vanguard owed to certain of its
members, and provided a guaranty debt to First South Farm Credit, ACA of $3.2
million under Vanguard's existing credit facility.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In
connection with the Acquisition, we received $28.5 million in gross proceeds
from the issuance of Series A Convertible Preferred Stock. The Company used
$17.7 million of these proceeds and issued shares of its Series K Convertible
Preferred Stock to purchase 100% of the equity interests of Vanguard in a
transaction intended to qualify as a tax-free exchange. Concurrently with the
closing of the Acquisition, the holders of the<a name="v075537_sb2_htm_gmnh0page_0_1_21"> Series I Convertible Preferred Stock, the
holders of certain warrants and the holders of the $750,000 Convertible Secured
Promissory Notes dated December&#160;6, 2005 converted such securities into
3,091,482 shares of our common stock. OPA, the holder of all of the Company's
Series I Convertible Preferred Stock, converted all of its Series I Convertible
Preferred Stock into common stock and waived certain anti-dilution rights, in
exchange for the consideration of warrants issued to OPA to purchase
approximately 4.8&#160;million common shares at an exercise price of $0.7587 per
share.</a></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Furthermore,
concurrently with the closing of the Acquisition, we entered into a management
services agreement with OPA. Under that agreement, principals and consultants of
OPA provide services to us (including, currently, the duties of Bruce Comer as
Chief Executive Officer). We granted stock options to OPA for 2,069,109 shares
of common stock, which have an exercise price of $0.7587 per share.<a name="v075537_sb2_htm_page_0_1_14" /></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Certain
of the transactions entered into in connection with the Acquisition were subject
to the approval of our stockholders. On November&#160;28, 2006, the stockholders
approved and ratified those transactions at a special meeting of shareholders.
The proposals approved and ratified were:</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><a name="hangingindent"><br></a></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="88%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Our
      reincorporation in the State of Delaware and other related changes in the
      rights of our stockholders (the
  &#8220;Reincorporation&#8221;);</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="70%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Our
      2006 Incentive Compensation Plan, as amended;
  and</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="79%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Indemnity
      agreements previously entered into between us and certain of our
      directors.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Immediately
following the approval of the Reincorporation by the stockholders, we
consummated the Reincorporation, and in connection therewith, our corporate name
was changed to &#8220;Allegro Biodiesel Corporation&#8221; and our new trading symbol became
OTC: ABDS.&#160;The Reincorporation resulted in an increase in the number of our
authorized shares of common stock to 150,000,000 shares and our authorized
shares of preferred stock to 50,000,000 shares.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Upon the
effectiveness of the Reincorporation, (i)&#160;each share of our Series H
Convertible Preferred Stock was automatically converted into shares of Series B
Convertible Preferred Stock, on a one-for-one basis; (ii)&#160;each share of our
Series J Convertible Preferred Stock was automatically converted into shares of
Series A Convertible Preferred Stock, on a one-for-ten thousand basis; and
(iii)&#160;each share of our Series K Convertible Preferred Stock was
automatically converted into 2,583.7209 shares of common stock (for an aggregate
of approximately 11.1&#160;million shares of common stock).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Employees</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We
currently employ no persons on a full-time basis.&#160;&#160;We utilize OPA to
serve as our management.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">On the
closing date of the Acquisition, we entered into a management services agreement
with OPA, pursuant to which certain of OPA's professionals (including but not
limited to Bruce Comer, our Chief Executive Officer and Principal Financial
Officer) and consultants perform general and administrative functions for us.
This agreement was subsequently amended and then replaced with a new agreement
on November 13, 2008. See &#8220;Item 13. Certain Relationships and Related
Transactions, and Director Independence.&#8221;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><a name="item_1_3_3">Item 1A.&#160; Risk Factors</a></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Not
applicable.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><a name="item_1_3_4"><br></a></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Item
1B.&#160; Unresolved Staff Comments</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">None.</font></div><br>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2</font></div>

      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><a name="item_1_3_5">Item 2.&#160; Properties</a></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Our
principal executive office is located at 6033 West Century Blvd., Suite 1090,
Los Angeles, California&#160;90045.&#160;&#160;Pursuant to a lease agreement,
which expires on July 31, 2009, we lease 2,082 square feet of office space at a
rate of $1.80 per square foot per month.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;We have no other
properties.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Under our
amended management services agreement with OPA, OPA reimburses us $1,320 per
month for shared use of office space <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">they
</font>occupy.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><a name="ftable" /><a name="item_1_3_6"><br></a></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Item
3.&#160; Legal Proceedings</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We are
not currently party to any legal proceedings.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><a name="item_1_3_7">Item 4.&#160; Submission of Matters to a Vote of Security
Holders</a></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Not
applicable</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><a name="part_1_2_3"><br></a></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">PART
II</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><a name="item_1_3_8"><br></a></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Item
5.&#160; Market for Registrant&#8217;s Common Equity, Related Stockholder Matters and
Issuer Purchase of Equity Securities</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Our
common stock is approved for quotation on the Over-the-Counter Bulletin Board
under the trading symbol &#8220;ABDS&#8221;. The following table sets forth the high and low
sales prices for our common stock for the periods noted, as reported by the
National Daily Quotation Service and the Over-The-Counter Bulletin Board.
Quotations reflect inter-dealer prices, without retail mark-up, markdown or
commission and may not represent actual transactions.</font></div>

      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr bgcolor="white">
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="36%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Equity
      compensation plans not approved by security holders</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="middle" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
